name: My Little Daily Sacrifice
description:
You Finally Started Your Own BitConnect Operation. 

Things Were Going Great Until One Day, The Bubble Popped. 

All Of A Sudden, BitConnects Are Worth Nothing! 

You Decided To Sell Your Soul To Satan. All Satan Wants Is A Couple Of Sacrifices.  

But A Lawyer Can Get You Out If You Have 5,000$ In Bank.
